page.title: 03THE ROWSLEY & BEELEY AREA
page.content:
THE ROWSLEY&BEELEY AREA
Our rectangle is mostly trees and wood.It has got two villages which are called Beeley and Rowsley.We have got some of Chatsworth Park in our block, about four people live in it and live up Church lane which is in our block. Our rectangle is 4 by 3km,We did seven miles of it.Most of the walk we did was through woodland and fields.There are two rivers called the river Derwent and the river Wye.It is the river Derwent that runs through Chatsworth park.The river Wye runs past our school. Our school is not in our block . It was nice walking round all the woods and fields.The fields are mostly grazing land and farm land and the woods are coniferous and deciduous.
